# eslint/no-void <Badge type="info" text="Restriction" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Disallow `void` operators.

### Example

```javascript
// error
void 0;
var foo = void 0;

// success
("var foo = bar()");
("foo.void()");
("foo.void = bar");
```
